thread.title: Rep. Byrne must fight for improved health care bill
thread.title_full: Rep. Byrne must fight for improved health care bill

author: Guest Voices
title: Rep. Byrne must fight for improved health care bill
text: Twice a day, I sit with my one-year-old son, cup my hands, and for 15 minutes, I clap his chest, sides, and back to loosen the abnormally thick mucus in his lungs. Telly has a genetic disorder called cystic fibrosis (CF). Last year, my wife and I spent a combined 450 hours on respiratory treatments and therapies.
